revised_title: Deep-Sea Sounding in 7706 Fathoms: A Record-Breaking Expedition
tldr: Captain Henry Mangles Denham and his team successfully conducted a deep-sea sounding expedition, reaching a depth of 7706 fathoms. The sea bottom was reached using a specially designed sounding line, and the descent took 911 minutes. The depths surpassed the elevation of the highest mountains, demonstrating the vastness of the oceanic world.
